research_summary: 06 October 2021Link copiedWhat is a neural network A neural network is amachine learningprogram, or model, that makes decisions in a manner similar to the human brain, by using processes that mimic the way biological neurons work together to identify phenomena, weigh options and arrive at conclusions Every neural network consists of layers of nodes or artificial neurons, an input layer, one or more hidden layers, and an output layer
